name: 16Pcs Adjustable Furniture Leveling Feet with T-Nuts, 1/4"-20 UNC Thread Screw-in Furniture Levelers for Chairs, Nightstands, Small Cabinets
short_description: [Exceptional Stability]: Ensure your furniture stands firm and level on any surface with these adjustable furniture levelers. Perfect for preventing wobbling and tipping, they provide a stable foundation for tables, chairs, and more.

[Durable Materials]: Made from high-quality galvanized steel and featuring a non-slip PP base, these levelers are built to last. They resist rust and wear, supporting heavy loads to ensure long-term use and floor protection.

[Universal Compatibility]: These versatile levelers are suitable for various furniture types and flooring surfaces, including wood, laminate, tile, and carpet. Ideal for chairs, tables, cabinets, and other furniture, they offer a universal solution for stability.

[Easy Installation]: With the included T-nuts, installation is straightforward and secure. Designed for furniture legs over 1 inch in diameter, simply drill a hole, insert the T-nut, and screw in the leveler for a perfect fit. Note: Ensure your furniture legs are larger than 1 inch in diameter to avoid cracking during installation.

[Protective and Practical]: Not only do these levelers stabilize your furniture, but they also protect your floors from scratches and reduce noise when moving furniture. A practical addition to any home, they enhance both functionality and aesthetics.
product_description: Enhance the stability and functionality of your furniture with the Mrosnail 16Pcs 1/4-20 Adjustable Furniture Levelers. This set includes 16 high-quality leveling feet and T-nuts, providing a robust solution for securing and leveling your furniture on uneven surfaces. Each leveler is constructed from durable galvanized steel and features a non-slip PP base, ensuring long-lasting performance and protection for your floors. These levelers can support heavy loads and are resistant to rust and wear, making them ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. The installation process is simple and efficient. With the included T-nuts, you can easily secure the levelers to furniture legs over 1 inch in diameter. Drill a hole, insert the T-nut, and screw in the leveler for a perfect fit and stability. Note: Ensure your furniture legs are larger than 1 inch in diameter to avoid cracking during installation. Designed for versatility, these levelers are compatible with a wide range of furniture pieces and flooring types. Whether you need to stabilize a dining chair, desk, cabinet, or any other furniture, these levelers provide the necessary support and balance. Not only do these levelers improve stability, but they also protect your floors from scratches and reduce noise when moving furniture. Please note that these levelers are recommended for wooden furniture legs. For metal furniture legs, welding or riveting of 1/4" thread inserts is required. Non-professionals should avoid these operations to prevent damage. Upgrade your home or office with the Mrosnail Adjustable Furniture Levelers and enjoy enhanced stability, protection, and functionality for all your furniture needs.

name: Heavy Duty Leg Levelers 3/8''-16 Thread, 12 Pcs Adjustable Leveling Feet Furniture Levelers Screw on with Threaded Inserts for Tables Chairs Cabinets Sofa, Support 3960LBs- Large Base, Black
short_description: STRONG MATERIAL--These adjustable furniture levelers are made of galvanized steel that will never get rusted, they are fully adjustable threads that provide maximum support. Comes with a high-density thick felt pad for the base to reduce friction and noise while moving or sliding the furniture.

Total Height: 2.27"; Screw Length: 1.5"; Thread Size: 3/8''-16; Base Diameter: 1.4"; Adjust Height: 0.9". Please read the size specification picture before purchasing.

EASY TO INSTALL--Simply pre-drill a hole with a diameter of 1/2" and a depth greater than 1-1/2" on the furniture leg, then use a hammer to hammer in the inserted t-nut and screw in the leg levelers. Note: This product is recommended for furniture with a leg diameter greater than 1".

SUFFICIENT QUANTITY--Each package contains 12 pcs threaded furniture levelers with 12 pcs threaded inserts and 12 pcs felt pad. Each leg leveler can support a max 330LBs, a set of 12 weight capacity up to 3960LBs. It is a perfect solution to adjust the level of all types of furniture in the home, office, school, and restaurant.

name: WOBBLE WEDGES Flexible Plastic Shims - Leveling Shims for Home Improvement, Furniture Levelers, Table, and Toilet for Leveling - Made in USA Plastic Wedges Shim for Appliances (Clear, 30-Pack)
short_description: HOME IMPROVEMENT OR DIY-ERS: Our flexible clear plastic shims for leveling are versatile wedge tools that can be used to fix things around the house like a professional! These spacers work as a stabilizer for an uneven table, bed frame, bookshelf, dresser, etc.

EVERYDAY USE: Our flexible clear wedges are ideal for leveling furniture while protecting wood and ceramic floors. Stabilize uneven bases of furniture, level large kitchen equipment, and fix wobbly tables. Easily level out your shelves and fix home furniture.

PLUMBING FIXER & TOILET SHIM: The soft rubber spacers are flexible and can fit in small spaces to absorb vibrations and silence a rattling water pipe. This leveling tool also fixes a tilting or wobbly toilet. You can trim the plastic wedges so it will always be a perfect fit.

MADE IN USA - MODULAR DESIGN: Precision engineered tapered leveling plastic shims feature interlocking ridges for a non-slip grip on both sides. You can securely stack these spacers to fit and level any space. The wedge is roughly 1.92" x 1.11" x .25" with a 6.45º angle.

ESSENTIAL LEVELING TOOL: These shims and wedges for leveling should be in the tool box of every plumber and handyman. Wobble Wedges blend seamlessly into any environment, and can be easily cut or trimmed for a perfect fit.
